scenario.init: Machine is in normal operation; coolant flow is stable.
scenario.expected_result: Coolant circulates properly through the system, keeping the machine at a stable temperature. Coolant level remains within normal operating range. No system faults occur.
scenario.instead_failure: The high pressure pump fails and coolant level in tank drops below the minimum threshold.

diagnoses.name: Leakage in coolant system.
diagnoses.comment: Leakage in coolant system causes minimum level warnings and finally pump protection to trigger
